title: Beijing stresses Marxist education in college (Beijing Municipal Government)
text: ( Source : Beijing Municipal Government ) Beijing, home to a number of top universities, will spend 200 million yuan (31.5 mln US dollars ) annually to promote the study of Marxism in colleges. According to a guideline issued by the city
